Embed an intelligent chatbot widget on any website with just a few lines of code

Quick Start View Examples

üì¶ CDN URLs (jsDelivr)

Use these URLs to include the chatbot widget in your website:

JavaScript:
https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/[USERNAME]/quick-chat-webflow-bot-44@main/dist/cdn/chatbot-widget.js
CSS:
https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/[USERNAME]/quick-chat-webflow-bot-44@main/dist/cdn/chatbot-widget.css

Replace [USERNAME] with your GitHub username

üöÄ Quick Start

Add this code snippet to any HTML page:

<!-- Include CSS -->
<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/[USERNAME]/quick-chat-webflow-bot-44@main/dist/cdn/chatbot-widget.css">

<!-- Include JavaScript -->
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/[USERNAME]/quick-chat-webflow-bot-44@main/dist/cdn/chatbot-widget.js"></script>

<!-- Initialize Widget -->
<script>
ChatbotWidget.init({
    webhookUrl: 'https://your-webhook-url.com',
    title: 'Chat with us',
    welcomeMessage: 'Hello! How can I help you today?',
    primaryColor: '#6366f1',
    secondaryColor: '#f1f5f9',
    showWelcomeScreen: true
});
</script>

üìã Configuration Examples

Basic Configuration

ChatbotWidget.init({
    webhookUrl: 'https://your-api-endpoint.com/chat',
    title: 'Customer Support',
    welcomeMessage: 'Hi there! How can we help you today?',
    primaryColor: '#6366f1',
    secondaryColor: '#f1f5f9'
});

Advanced Configuration with Welcome Screen

ChatbotWidget.init({
    webhookUrl: 'https://your-api-endpoint.com/chat',
    title: 'AI Assistant',
    bio: 'Powered by advanced AI technology',
    welcomeMessage: 'Welcome! I can help you with bookings, questions, and more.',
    showWelcomeScreen: true,
    avatarUrl: 'https://your-site.com/avatar.png',
    welcomeButtons: [
        { id: '1', text: 'Book Appointment', message: 'I want to book an appointment' },
        { id: '2', text: 'Get Help', message: 'I need help with something' },
        { id: '3', text: 'Contact Sales', message: 'I want to talk to sales' },
        { id: '4', text: 'Support', message: 'I need technical support' }
    ],
    primaryColor: '#10b981',
    secondaryColor: '#f0fdf4',
    headerGradientColor: '#059669',
    chatBackground: '#ffffff',
    botTextColor: '#374151',
    userTextColor: '#ffffff',
    position: 'bottom-right'
});

Custom Styling

ChatbotWidget.init({
    webhookUrl: 'https://your-api-endpoint.com/chat',
    title: 'Brand Bot',
    primaryColor: '#e11d48',
    secondaryColor: '#fef2f2',
    headerGradientColor: '#be185d',
    chatBackground: '#ffffff',
    botTextColor: '#1f2937',
    userTextColor: '#ffffff',
    logoBackgroundColor: '#fee2e2',
    logoBorderColor: '#fecaca',
    fontFamily: "'Inter', sans-serif"
});

‚öôÔ∏è Configuration Options

ChatbotWidget.init({
    // Required
    webhookUrl: 'string',              // Your chat API endpoint
    
    // Basic Settings
    title: 'string',                   // Widget title
    bio: 'string',                     // Optional bio text
    placeholder: 'string',             // Input placeholder
    welcomeMessage: 'string',          // Initial bot message
    
    // Welcome Screen
    showWelcomeScreen: boolean,        // Show welcome screen
    avatarUrl: 'string',              // Avatar/logo image URL
    welcomeButtons: [{                 // Welcome screen buttons
        id: 'string',
        text: 'string',
        message: 'string'
    }],
    
    // Styling
    position: 'bottom-right',          // 'bottom-right' | 'bottom-left'
    primaryColor: '#6366f1',          // Primary brand color
    secondaryColor: '#f1f5f9',        // Secondary color
    headerGradientColor: '#5856eb',    // Header gradient color
    chatBackground: '#ffffff',         // Chat area background
    botTextColor: '#374151',          // Bot message text color
    userTextColor: '#ffffff',         // User message text color
    logoBackgroundColor: '#f3f4f6',   // Logo background
    logoBorderColor: '#d1d5db',       // Logo border
    fontFamily: 'Arial, sans-serif',  // Custom font
    
    // User Context
    userId: 'string',                 // Optional user ID
    clinicName: 'string',             // Optional clinic/company name
    clinicId: 'string'                // Optional clinic/company ID
});
